info.name: XOLogic  API Test
info.description:
The following is a list of all XOLogic v1 API endpoints, the most updated versions of all API endpoints can always be found at https://xologic.com/api/doc . The list of settable and returnable fields specified below, as well as the permissable record sets that are returned, will change when logging into users of a different permission level.
 
Be sure to look at the Models to get a better understanding of what each field represents. You can see the models by clicking on the Model tab instead of the Example Value tab, or they are also listed at the bottom of the page.

tests for all apis found in the api/v1 folder  (customer, account, product, order_product, user)

query.value: Smooth and tailored, this interesting, smaller scale, 3-light Circolo(TM) chandelier combines contemporary design with European flair. Clear cylindrical glass globes with Etched Glass centers repeat the circular theme extending the artistry. A stylish Brushed Nickel finish completes the look. 60-W. Max. (M) (T10 lamp required) Dia. 22\", Body Height 21-1/2\", overall 59\", extra lead wire 81\". For additional chain to extend height order No. 2996 NI. For additional stems order No. 2997 (24\") and/or 2999 (12\") NI.

url.raw: {{exo3}}/api/v1/product/{{new_productID}}?method=get&fields=XOItemID,VendorID,VItemID,ItemID,Vendor Name,Item Number,Item Name,Product Type,Item Cost,Short Description,Creation Date,IMAP

request.description:
Limit fields returned to just those within this comma 
seperated list. Fields specified must be valid from the 
available output.

filter records by passed AccountID value. Value can be a 
comma seperated list. AccountIDMin and/or 
AccountIDMax can also be passed to do ranges
